desc: At the beginning of every turn, Anese buffs and increases ally's defense by (15 + 0.0005*ARM)% (max 30%).

At the beginning of every turn, Thelgrimm casts a spell on 2-3 random enemies causing 100% (INT damage) with a (25 + 0.0005*INT)% (max 40%) chance of causing (cripple, sleep, stun, or paralyze of equal chance)
Every turn, Lilia casts a spell on ally team, buffing ally's attack by (15 + 0.0003*INT)% (max 30%) for 2 turns.
Every turn, Minnu casts a spell on all members of ally team, giving a (40+0.00075*ARM)% (max 80%) chance of cleansing ally team of all negative SE.
Receive extra 40% INT. (self) Every turn, Elara casts a spell on enemy team, with (25 + 0.00075*MR)% (max 50%) chance of crippling each enemy.
Every turn, Arathorn casts a spell on enemy team, lowering enemy's defense by (15 + 0.0003*INT)% (max 30%) for 2 turns.
Every turn, Olga casts a spell on all members of ally team, adding 16 mana to each ally member.
Every turn, Olga casts a spell on all members of ally team, adding 17 mana to each ally member.
Every turn, Olga casts a spell on all members of ally team, adding 18 mana to each ally member.
Every turn, Olga casts a spell on all members of ally team, adding 19 mana to each ally member.
Every turn, Olga casts a spell on all members of ally team, adding 20 mana to each ally member.
Every turn, Olga casts a spell on all members of ally team, adding 21 mana to each ally member.
Every turn, Olga casts a spell on all members of ally team, adding 22 mana to each ally member.
Every turn, Olga casts a spell on all members of ally team, adding 23 mana to each ally member.
Every turn, Olga casts a spell on all members of ally team, adding 24 mana to each ally member.
Every turn, Olga casts a spell on all members of ally team, adding 25 mana to each ally member.

Every battle, when an ally faints (0 HP), Evil Ektar is able to resurrect that ally to (100%) HP. Evil Ektar is unable to resurrect himself. If Evil Ektar is fainted, this skill cannot be activated. (Max use per battle = No Limit)

Every battle, when an ally faints (0 HP), Berbegazi is able to resurrect that ally to (100%) HP. Resurrected ally also gains 25% DEF buff for 1 turn. Berbegazi is unable to resurrect himself. If Berbegazi is fainted, this skill cannot be activated. (Max use per battle = No Limit)
